clumio_dynamo_cloudtrail_event_rule.description: Watches for resource changes in DynamoDB (CloudTrail).
clumio_dynamo_cloudtrail_event_rule.name: ClumioDynamoCloudtrailRule_${var.clumio_token}

clumio_ebs_cloudtrail_event_rule.description: Watches for resource changes in EBS (CloudTrail).
clumio_ebs_cloudtrail_event_rule.name: ClumioEBSCloudtrailRule_${var.clumio_token}

clumio_ebs_cloudwatch_event_rule.description: Watches for resource changes in EBS (CloudWatch).
clumio_ebs_cloudwatch_event_rule.name: ClumioEBSCloudwatchRule_${var.clumio_token}

clumio_ec2_cloudtrail_event_rule.description: Watches for resource changes in EC2 (CloudTrail).
clumio_ec2_cloudtrail_event_rule.name: ClumioEC2CloudtrailRule_${var.clumio_token}

clumio_ec2_cloudwatch_event_rule.description: Watches for resource changes in EC2 (CloudWatch).
clumio_ec2_cloudwatch_event_rule.name: ClumioEC2CloudwatchRule_${var.clumio_token}

clumio_rds_cloudtrail_event_rule.description: Watches for resource changes in RDS (CloudTrail).
clumio_rds_cloudtrail_event_rule.name: ClumioRDSCloudtrailRule_${var.clumio_token}

clumio_rds_cloudwatch_event_rule.description: Watches for resource changes in RDS (CloudWatch).
clumio_rds_cloudwatch_event_rule.event_pattern: {"source": ["aws.rds"], "detail-type": ["RDS DB Instance Event","RDS DB Snapshot Event","RDS DB Cluster Event","RDS DB Cluster Snapshot Event" ], "detail": {"SourceType": ["DB_INSTANCE", "SNAPSHOT", "CLUSTER", "CLUSTER_SNAPSHOT"] } }
clumio_rds_cloudwatch_event_rule.name: ClumioRDSCloudwatchRule_${var.clumio_token}

clumio_s3_cloudtrail_event_rule.description: Watches for bucket-level resource changes in S3 (CloudTrail).
clumio_s3_cloudtrail_event_rule.name: ClumioS3CloudtrailEventRule_${var.clumio_token}

clumio_dynamodb_policy.description: Grants access to Clumio for DynamoDB SecureVault.
clumio_dynamodb_policy.name: ClumioDynamoDbPolicy-${var.aws_region}-${var.clumio_token}

clumio_iam_permissions_boundary.description: Enforces a permissions boundary for roles created by Clumio.
clumio_iam_permissions_boundary.name: ClumioIAMPermissionsBoundary-${var.aws_region}-${var.clumio_token}

clumio_s3_protect_policy.description: Grants access to Clumio for S3 protection
clumio_s3_protect_policy.name: ClumioS3ProtectPolicy-${var.aws_region}-${var.clumio_token}

clumio_warm_protect_dynamodb_policy.description: Grants access to Clumio for DynamoDB warm-tier protection.
clumio_warm_protect_dynamodb_policy.name: ClumioWarmProtectDynamoDbPolicy-${var.aws_region}-${var.clumio_token}
